modName: Khajiit Follower K'athia Ma'  Bard AddOn
summary:
This is the same khajiit follower of the http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82000/?
But now, this is more weak and her is a Bard!
descriptionHtml:

Race: Khajiit Female

Voice: Female Young

Marriageable: Yes

Body: CBBEv3

Location: Riverwood - Sleep Giant Inn

Style: Bard[/b][b]
